resources.string: On signing up to codevated, we will assume that you have read and agreed to our terms and conditions.
Your new password will be sent to your email address. Make sure you enter the email address you used during your sign up!
This will remove your account and data completely from codevated
you have completed the signup process! An email has been sent to you with
For your topic to be posted, you will require atleast one person to second it. By default, we will send it to your mentors to aid in the process
